author: AP
title: Coronavirus | U.S. President Donald Trump resists national shutdown, leaving it up to States
description: Trump said he wants to give governors’ “flexibility” on whether a stay-at-home policy is the best option for their constituents but acknowledged that he’s looking at limiting air and rail travel between hotspots within the United States
content: U.S. President Donald Trump is resisting calls to issue a national stay-at-home order to stem the spread of the novel coronavirus despite his administrations projections that tens of thousands of Americans are likely to be killed by the disease. One by one, t… [+7704 chars]
